body:
Reported by @Random-Liu in https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/46047#issuecomment-310492891. Filing a bug for easy tracking.

After #46047, `kubelet --version` now prints all flags and the version. This is pretty unconventional and should probably be fixed.

```
$ kubelet --version
I0622 13:25:53.174546   28020 flags.go:52] FLAG: --address="0.0.0.0"
I0622 13:25:53.174632   28020 flags.go:52] FLAG: --allow-privileged="false"
I0622 13:25:53.174643   28020 flags.go:52] FLAG: --alsologtostderr="false"
I0622 13:25:53.174654   28020 flags.go:52] FLAG: --anonymous-auth="true"
I0622 13:25:53.174665   28020 flags.go:52] FLAG: --api-servers="[]"
I0622 13:25:53.174686   28020 flags.go:52] FLAG: --application-metrics-count-limit="100"
I0622 13:25:53.174696   28020 flags.go:52] FLAG: --authentication-token-webhook="false"
I0622 13:25:53.174705   28020 flags.go:52] FLAG: --authentication-token-webhook-cache-ttl="2m0s"
I0622 13:25:53.174717   28020 flags.go:52] FLAG: --authorization-mode="AlwaysAllow"
I0622 13:25:53.174729   28020 flags.go:52] FLAG: --authorization-webhook-cache-authorized-ttl="5m0s"
I0622 13:25:53.174738   28020 flags.go:52] FLAG: --authorization-webhook-cache-unauthorized-ttl="30s"
I0622 13:25:53.174747   28020 flags.go:52] FLAG: --azure-container-registry-config=""

I0622 13:25:53.174765   28020 flags.go:52] FLAG: --bootstrap-kubeconfig=""
I0622 13:25:53.174773   28020 flags.go:52] FLAG: --cadvisor-port="4194"
I0622 13:25:53.174792   28020 flags.go:52] FLAG: --cert-dir="/var/run/kubernetes"
I0622 13:25:53.174801   28020 flags.go:52] FLAG: --cgroup-driver="cgroupfs"
I0622 13:25:53.174810   28020 flags.go:52] FLAG: --cgroup-root=""
I0622 13:25:53.174818   28020 flags.go:52] FLAG: --cgroups-per-qos="true"
```

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG CLI.
labels.name: sig/cli

title: kubelet --version should not print all the flags
